00041 Op_Conv_EF_Stab_PolyMAC_Face::Op_Conv_EF_Stab_PolyMAC_Face()
00042 {
00043   alpha = 1; //par defaut, on fait de l'amont
00044 }

00053 Entree& Op_Conv_EF_Stab_PolyMAC_Face::readOn( Entree& is )
00054 {
00055   Op_Conv_PolyMAC_base::readOn( is );
00056   Param param(que_suis_je());
00057   param.ajouter("alpha", &alpha);            //!< XD_ADD_P double parametre ajustant la stabilisation de 0 (schema centre) a 1 (schema amont)
00058   param.lire_avec_accolades_depuis(is);
00059   return is;
00060 }
00061 
00062 void Op_Conv_EF_Stab_PolyMAC_Face::completer()
00063 {
00064   Op_Conv_PolyMAC_base::completer();
00065   const Zone_PolyMAC& zone = la_zone_poly_.valeur();
00066   const IntTab& e_f = zone.elem_faces(), &f_e = zone.face_voisins();
00067   const DoubleTab& xp = zone.xp(), &xv = zone.xv();
00068   int i, j, k, e1, e2, f, f1, f2, ok;
00069 
00070   if (zone.zone().nb_joints() && zone.zone().joint(0).epaisseur() < 2)
00071     Cerr << "Op_Conv_EF_Stab_PolyMAC_Face : largeur de joint insuffisante (minimum 2)!" << finl, Process::exit();
00072 
00073   Cerr << zone.zone().domaine().le_nom() << " : initialisation de la convection aux faces... ";
00074 
00075   IntTrav ntot, nequiv;
00076   zone.creer_tableau_faces(ntot), zone.creer_tableau_faces(nequiv);
00077   equiv.resize(zone.nb_faces_tot(), 2, e_f.dimension(1));
00078   for (f = 0, equiv = -1; f < zone.nb_faces_tot(); f++) if ((e1 = f_e(f, 0)) >= 0 && (e2 = f_e(f, 1)) >= 0)
00079       for (i = 0; i < e_f.dimension(1) && (f1 = e_f(e1, i)) >= 0; i++)
00080         for (j = 0, ntot(f)++; j < e_f.dimension(1) && (f2 = e_f(e2, j)) >= 0; j++)
00081           {
00082             for (k = 0, ok = 1; ok && k < dimension; k++) ok &= dabs((xv(f1, k) - xp(e1, k)) - (xv(f2, k) - xp(e2, k))) < 1e-6;
00083             if (ok) equiv(f, 0, i) = f2, equiv(f, 1, j) = f1, nequiv(f)++;
00084           }
00085   if (mp_somme_vect(ntot)) Cerr << mp_somme_vect(nequiv) * 100. / mp_somme_vect(ntot) << "% de convection directe!" << finl;
00086   porosite_f.ref(zone.porosite_face());
00087   porosite_e.ref(zone.porosite_elem());
00088 }
00089 
00090 void Op_Conv_EF_Stab_PolyMAC_Face::dimensionner(Matrice_Morse& mat) const
00091 {
00092   const Zone_PolyMAC& zone = la_zone_poly_.valeur();
00093   const Champ_Face_PolyMAC& ch = ref_cast(Champ_Face_PolyMAC, equation().inconnue().valeur());
00094   const IntTab& e_f = zone.elem_faces(), &f_e = zone.face_voisins();
00095   const DoubleTab& xp = zone.xp(), &xv = zone.xv();
00096   const DoubleVect& fs = zone.face_surfaces(), &vf = zone.volumes_entrelaces();
00097   int i, j, k, l, m, e, eb, f, fb, fc, idx;
00098 
00099   ch.init_cl(), zone.init_ve();
00100 
00101   IntTab stencil(0, 2);
00102   stencil.set_smart_resize(1);
00103 
00104   for (e = 0; e < zone.nb_elem_tot(); e++)  for (i = 0; i < e_f.dimension(1) && (f = e_f(e, i)) >= 0; i++)
00105       for (j = 0; f < zone.nb_faces() && ch.icl(f, 0) < 2 && j < e_f.dimension(1) && (fb = e_f(e, j)) >= 0; j++)
00106         {
00107           if (ch.icl(fb, 0) < 2) stencil.append_line(f, fb);
00108           if ((fc = equiv(fb, e != f_e(fb, 0), i)) >= 0 || f_e(fb, 1) < 0) //equivalence ou bord -> convection de m2
00109             {
00110               int fa[2] = { f, fc }, ea[2] = { e, f_e(fb, e == f_e(fb, 0)) };
00111               for (k = 0; k < 2 && ea[k] >= 0; k++) for (l = zone.m2d(ea[k]), idx = 0; l < zone.m2d(ea[k] + 1); l++, idx++)
00112                   for (m = zone.m2i(l); e_f(ea[k], idx) == fa[k] && m < zone.m2i(l + 1); m++)
00113                     if (ch.icl(fc = e_f(ea[k], zone.m2j(m)), 0) < 2) stencil.append_line(f, fc);
00114             }
00115           else for (k = 0; k < 2 && (eb = f_e(fb, k)) >= 0; k++) for (l = zone.vedeb(eb); l < zone.vedeb(eb + 1); l++) //sinon -> convection de ve.(xv-xp)
00116                 if (dabs(zone.dot(&xv(f, 0), &zone.veci(l, 0), &xp(e, 0))) > 1e-8 * vf(f) / fs(f) && ch.icl(fc = zone.veji(l), 0) < 2)
00117                   stencil.append_line(f, fc);
00118         }
00119 
00120   tableau_trier_retirer_doublons(stencil);
00121   int taille = zone.nb_faces_tot() + (dimension < 3 ? zone.zone().domaine().nb_som_tot() : zone.zone().nb_aretes_tot());
00122   Matrix_tools::allocate_morse_matrix(taille, taille, stencil, mat);
00123 }
00124 
00125 // ajoute la contribution de la convection au second membre resu
00126 // renvoie resu
00127 inline DoubleTab& Op_Conv_EF_Stab_PolyMAC_Face::ajouter(const DoubleTab& inco, DoubleTab& resu) const
00128 {
00129   const Zone_PolyMAC& zone = la_zone_poly_.valeur();
00130   const Champ_Face_PolyMAC& ch = ref_cast(Champ_Face_PolyMAC, equation().inconnue().valeur());
00131   const Conds_lim& cls = la_zcl_poly_.valeur().les_conditions_limites();
00132   const IntTab& f_e = zone.face_voisins(), &e_f = zone.elem_faces();
00133   const DoubleTab& xp = zone.xp(), &xv = zone.xv(), &vfd = zone.volumes_entrelaces_dir(), &vit = vitesse_->valeurs();
00134   const DoubleVect& fs = zone.face_surfaces(), &ve = zone.volumes(), &pf = porosite_f, &pe = porosite_e;
00135 
00136   int i, j, k, l, m, e, eb, f, fb, fc, fd, fam, idx;
00137   double div;
00138   zone.init_ve();
00139 
00140 // element e -> contribution de la face fb a l'equation a la face f
00141   for (e = 0; e < zone.nb_elem_tot(); e++)
00142     {
00143       for (i = 0, div = 0; i < e_f.dimension(1) && (f = e_f(e, i)) >= 0; div += fs(f) * pf(f) * (e == f_e(f, 0) ? 1 : -1) * vit(f), i++)
00144         for (j = 0; f < zone.nb_faces() && ch.icl(f, 0) < 2 && j < e_f.dimension(1) && (fb = e_f(e, j)) >= 0; j++)
00145           for (k = 0; k < 2; k++) //amont/aval de fb
00146             {
00147               eb = f_e(fb, k); //element amont/aval de fb (toujours l'amont si Neumann)
00148               double fac = (e == f_e(f, 0) ? 1 : -1) * vit(fb) * (e == f_e(fb, 0) ? 1 : -1) * fs(fb) / ve(e) * (1. + (vit(fb) * (k ? -1 : 1) >= 0 ? 1. : -1.) * alpha) / 2;
00149               if ((fc = equiv(fb, e != f_e(fb, 0), i)) >= 0 || f_e(fb, 0) < 0 || f_e(fb, 1) < 0) //equivalence ou bord -> on convecte m2
00150                 {
00151                   if (eb >= 0) for (fam = (eb == e ? f : fc), l = zone.m2d(eb), idx = 0; l < zone.m2d(eb + 1); l++, idx++)
00152                       for (m = zone.m2i(l); fam == e_f(eb, idx) && m < zone.m2i(l + 1); m++) //convection de m2
00153                         fd = e_f(eb, zone.m2j(m)), resu(f) -= fac * (eb == f_e(fd, 0) ? 1 : -1) * ve(eb) * zone.m2c(m) * vfd(f, e != f_e(f, 0)) / vfd(fam, eb != f_e(fam, 0)) * pe(eb) * inco(fd);
00154                   else if (ch.icl(fb, 0) == 3) for (l = 0; l < dimension; l++) //face de Dirichlet -> on convecte la vitesse au bord
00155                       resu(f) -= fac * fs(f) * (xv(f, l) - xp(e, l)) * ref_cast(Dirichlet, cls[ch.icl(fb, 1)].valeur()).val_imp(ch.icl(fb, 2), l);
00156                 }
00157               else for (l = zone.vedeb(eb); l < zone.vedeb(eb + 1); l++) //face interne sans equivalence -> convection de ve
00158                   fc = zone.veji(l), resu(f) -= fac * fs(f) * zone.dot(&xv(f, 0), &zone.veci(l, 0), &xp(e, 0)) * pe(eb) * inco(fc);
00159             }
00160 
00161 // partie - (div v) v
00162       if (!incompressible_)
00163         for (i = 0; i < e_f.dimension(1) && (f = e_f(e, i)) >= 0; i++) for (j = zone.m2i(zone.m2d(e) + i); f < zone.nb_faces() && ch.icl(f, 0) < 2 && j < zone.m2i(zone.m2d(e) + i); j++)
00164             fb = e_f(e, zone.m2j(j)), resu(f) += (f == f_e(e, 0) ? 1 : -1) * (fb == f_e(e, 0) ? 1 : -1) * ve(e) * div * inco(fb);
00165     }
00166 
00167   return resu;
00168 }
00169 
00170 //
00171 //! on assemble la matrice.
00172 
00173 inline void Op_Conv_EF_Stab_PolyMAC_Face::contribuer_a_avec(const DoubleTab& inco, Matrice_Morse& matrice) const
00174 {
00175   const Zone_PolyMAC& zone = la_zone_poly_.valeur();
00176   const Champ_Face_PolyMAC& ch = ref_cast(Champ_Face_PolyMAC, equation().inconnue().valeur());
00177   const IntTab& f_e = zone.face_voisins(), &e_f = zone.elem_faces();
00178   const DoubleTab& xp = zone.xp(), &xv = zone.xv(), &vfd = zone.volumes_entrelaces_dir(), &vit = vitesse_->valeurs();
00179   const DoubleVect& fs = zone.face_surfaces(), &vf = zone.volumes_entrelaces(), &ve = zone.volumes(), &pe = porosite_e, &pf = porosite_f;
00180   int i, j, k, l, m, e, eb, f, fb, fc, fd, fam, idx;
00181   double div;
00182 
00183 // element e -> contribution de la face fb a l'equation a la face f
00184   for (e = 0; e < zone.nb_elem_tot(); e++)
00185     {
00186       for (i = 0, div = 0; i < e_f.dimension(1) && (f = e_f(e, i)) >= 0; div += fs(f) * pf(f) * (e == f_e(f, 0) ? 1 : -1) * vit(f), i++)
00187         for (j = 0; f < zone.nb_faces() && ch.icl(f, 0) < 2 && j < e_f.dimension(1) && (fb = e_f(e, j)) >= 0; j++)
00188           for (k = 0; (ch.icl(fb, 0) < 2 || ch.icl(fb, 0) == 3) && k < 2; k++) //amont/aval de fb
00189             {
00190               eb = f_e(fb, k); //element amont/aval de fb (toujours l'amont si Neumann)
00191               double fac = (e == f_e(f, 0) ? 1 : -1) * vit(fb) * (e == f_e(fb, 0) ? 1 : -1) * fs(fb) / ve(e) * (1. + (vit(fb) * (k ? -1. : 1) >= 0 ? 1. : -1.) * alpha) / 2;
00192               if ((fc = equiv(fb, e != f_e(fb, 0), i)) >= 0 || f_e(fb, 0) < 0 || f_e(fb, 1) < 0) //equivalence ou bord -> on convecte m2
00193                 {
00194                   if (eb >= 0)
00195                     {
00196                       for (fam = (eb == e ? f : fc), l = zone.m2d(eb), idx = 0; l < zone.m2d(eb + 1); l++, idx++)
00197                         for (m = zone.m2i(l); fam == e_f(eb, idx) && m < zone.m2i(l + 1); m++) if (ch.icl(fd = e_f(eb, zone.m2j(m)), 0) < 2) //convection de m2
00198                             matrice(f, fd) += fac * (eb == f_e(fd, 0) ? 1 : -1) * ve(eb) * zone.m2c(m) * vfd(f, e != f_e(f, 0)) / vfd(fam, eb != f_e(fam, 0)) * pe(eb);
00199                     }
00200                 }
00201               else for (l = zone.vedeb(eb); l < zone.vedeb(eb + 1); l++) //face interne sans equivalence -> convection de ve
00202                   if (ch.icl(fc = zone.veji(l), 0) < 2 && dabs(zone.dot(&xv(f, 0), &zone.veci(l, 0), &xp(e, 0))) > 1e-8 * vf(f) / fs(f))
00203                     matrice(f, fc) += fac * fs(f) * zone.dot(&xv(f, 0), &zone.veci(l, 0), &xp(e, 0)) * pe(eb);
00204             }
00205 
00206 // partie - (div v) v
00207       if (!incompressible_)
00208         for (i = 0; i < e_f.dimension(1) && (f = e_f(e, i)) >= 0; i++) for (j = zone.m2i(zone.m2d(e) + i); f < zone.nb_faces() && ch.icl(f, 0) < 2 && j < zone.m2i(zone.m2d(e) + i); j++)
00209             if (ch.icl(fb = e_f(e, zone.m2j(j)), 0) < 2) matrice(f, fb) -= (f == f_e(e, 0) ? 1 : -1) * (fb == f_e(e, 0) ? 1 : -1) * ve(e) * div;
00210     }
00211 }

00216 void Op_Conv_EF_Stab_PolyMAC_Face::contribuer_au_second_membre(DoubleTab& resu) const

00218   abort();

00221 
00222 void Op_Conv_EF_Stab_PolyMAC_Face::set_incompressible(const int flag)
00223 {
00224   if (flag == 0)
00225     {
00226       Cerr << "Compressible form of operator \"" << que_suis_je() << "\" :" << finl;
00227       Cerr << "Discretization of \u2207(inco \u2297 v) - v \u2207.(inco)" << finl;
00228     }
00229   incompressible_ = flag;
00230 }
